intro: Monsonia griquana, commonly known as the Grootfontein bellflower, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Geraniaceae and is characterized by its showy, bell-shaped flowers that range in color from white to pink. Monsonia griquana is appreciated for its ornamental value and is sometimes cultivated in gardens.
